content.html:
How did you do? Take a moment to reflect on how many answers you got right and wrong on the previous pages. Did you complete the mini-lesson reviews? If not, completing these resources can help you get a better understanding of these concepts:

  • Find Slope
  • Describe Graphs
  • Extend a Pattern

If you are still struggling, be sure to reach out to your teacher for additional help. Nobody is good at problems like this the first try. Keep at it, and it will get easier.

To continue with the unit, open the course index and select “Section A Overview: Functions and Their Representations”. Otherwise, select the previous button to repeat this lesson.
